messages.subject: Urgent-Medical Privacy
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.forhealthfreedom.org/Publications/Privacy/NR20020402.html Please go to the attached website and review this information. It is very important to act
messages.messageBody:
http://www.forhealthfreedom.org/Publications/Privacy/NR20020402.html

Please go to the attached website and review this information. It is
very
important to act on this right now so your letter will be counted.
This will
only take a few minutes as a sample letter is provided for you to
use. Cut
and paste it into a document and personalize it. Every letter gets
counted
and with each opportunity on this issue to provide public comment, the
letters have gotten fewer and fewer. Please don't delay on this
important
issue.

From The Health Freedom Institute:
URGENT REMINDER: Share Your Comments on Medical Privacy by April 26

Washington, DC--Once again, the U.S. Department of Health and Human
Services
is proposing to change the federal medical privacy rule. If the
changes go
through as proposed, YOUR personal health information can be shared
with
health insurers, hospitals, and medical data-processing companies
(among
other third parties) WITHOUT your consent!

You have until April 26, 2002 (this coming Friday) to postmark your
comments
or comment via the Internet. Please help spread the word!
